name: circuits
description: This describes the circuit used in pallet.

scripts.pot:2: snarkjs powersoftau contribute pot12_0000.ptau pot12_0001.ptau --name='First contribution' -v
scripts.pot:3: snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 pot12_0001.ptau pot12_final.ptau -v
scripts.pot:4: snarkjs groth16 setup confidential_transfer.r1cs pot12_final.ptau confidential_transfer_0000.zkey
scripts.pot:5: snarkjs zkey contribute confidential_transfer_0000.zkey confidential_transfer_0001.zkey --name='1st Contributor Name' -v
scripts.pot:6: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey confidential_transfer_0001.zkey verification_key.json
scripts.prove: snarkjs groth16 prove confidential_transfer_0001.zkey witness.wtns proof.json public.json
scripts.verify: snarkjs groth16 verify verification_key.json public.json proof.json
